message.name: ERR_DUPLICATE_RELATEDID_TYPE_CONCERN_ROLE
message.locale: Cannot have two records that share the same relatedID, message type and Concern Role

message.name: ERR_CONCERN_ROLE_ID_IS_MANDATORY
message.locale: You must specify a participant for this message.

message.name: ERR_MESSAGE_TYPE_IS_MANDATORY
message.locale: You must specify a type for this message.

message.name: ERR_PROPERTY_FILE_NAME_IS_MANDATORY
message.locale: You must specify a property file for this message.

message.name: ERR_TITLE_PROPERTY_IS_MANDATORY
message.locale: You must specify a title property for this message.

message.name: ERR_MESSAGE_BODY_PROPERTY_IS_MANDATORY
message.locale: You must specify a message body property for this message.

message.name: ERR_EFFECTIVE_DATE_TIME_IS_MANDATORY
message.locale: You must specify an effective date time for this message.

message.name: ERR_EXPIRY_DATE_TIME_IS_MANDATORY
message.locale: You must specify an expiry date time for this message.
